attributes.background: Phillip Hammond has undermined Brexit at every step and his leaked conference call whereby he gave 330 business leaders assurance that no-deal brexit wouldn't happen and Article 50 rescinded demonstrates his utter contempt for the electorate and brexit voters. He is no longer fit for his post.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
